Bernie Sanders ( technically an Independent, though he generally sides with Democrats) said Paul Ryan 's Roadmap would slash Social Security benefits and provide tax breaks for the wealthy, while raising taxes on just about everyone else. The fact of the matter is, Social Security has not contributed one nickel to our deficit or our national debt, and it must be protected, Bernie Sanders added. In a nod to how he was regarded as Google's elder statesman, Mr. Eric Schmidt tweeted wryly after the management shifts were announced, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! In the decade since Mr. Eric Schmidt joined Google, the company blew by competitors such as Microsoft Corp. in the search-ad business.
